title: Spy Wars
description: Bondman, spy and womanizer, is on mission to stop the League of Evil. He has his sophisticated suit, his beloved shiny silver car, his highly-skilled techniques and gentlemanly behavior. Heâ€™s super cool and clever.
quote: I will bring happiness to every lady in this world.
altHero: Bondman, wearing a suit, trench coat, eye mask, and hat, bursts through a door
alt1: Bondman watches a screen where Commander, wearing a Guy Fawkes mask, gives a brief
